title: 'Amazing product!'
body: I didn't even know I needed this product until I had it. A friend recommended this one and I'm so grateful they did. Superb quality, truly heat resistant. Looks aesthetically beautiful wherever you keep it, and also keeps our dining table safe. Just go for it!

title: 'Superb'
body: 'Good quality cork. I keep them next to the stovetop ready to accept hot pots. They are sturdy heat absorbant and beautifully designed.'

title: 'Awesome product from FOHOGO!!'
body: 'Few years back bought cork mat from USA for my kitchen. Was struggling to find similar product in Indian. Finally got an excellent quality hot pan trivet from Fohogo. I am impressed that Indian brands are far better than international brands.'

title: 'Perfect to keep your furniture safe!'
body: 'Light weight and durable. Exactly what I was looking for. Will keep the table safe from heat and is sturdy as well. Olive color looks cool. Found it better than the one I got from mall.'

title: 'Excellent finish
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''Loved how easy to use and lightweight they are Works well for daily use on tables and dinning'

title: 'Distinctive product'
body: 'Very nice product. Kept hot casserole on it truly heat resistant. Surprised with such a good quality. Wooden texture is matching with everything in our house. Thanks FOHOGO Team keep the good work and wish you all the best for future endeavour.üëç'
